colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR 'DI NI, RGYUD LAS GSUNGS PA'I DER LHAN THABS BSNAN NAS BRIS PA NI, ^DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYANG GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL` BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS, BDAG DANG BDAG SKAL MNYAM RNAMS SU PHAN PAR RE BA BSAM PA'I SGO NAS GYIS A, NYES LTUNG LHAG CHAD BYUNG BA BLA MA MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS KYI SPYAN @007B SNGAR BSHAGS BZOD PAR ZHUS, GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DE'I BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD BYANG CHUB SNYING PO MA THOB KYI BAR DU BLA MA MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS KYI 'BRAL MED 'GROGS MDZOD NAS 'GAL RKYEN BAR CHDO KUN SEL ZHING MCHOG MTHUN DNGOS GRUB THOB PA'I GROGS MDZOD PAR GYUR CIG ,PHAN PAR GYUR CIG ,)
